title.rendered: Voepass Linhas Aéreas (Passaredo airlines) in Ribeirao Preto, Brazil

content.rendered:
Voepass Linhas Aéreas previously known as Passaredo Linhas Aéreas is an airline based in Ribeirão Preto, São Paulo, Brazil. It operates regional services in Brazil. In the year 2014 Passaredo along with Avianca, was considered the safest of Brazil in a ranking of AirlineRatings.com, receiving seven star rating. A total of 149 evaluated airlines got seven stars, the highest score.

 

Voepass Airlines in Ribeirao Preto, Brazil Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address: Av. Thomaz Alberto Whately, s / n, lote 16
Jardim Aeroporto (Hangars Sector)
Zip code: 14078-550 – Ribeirão Preto – SP

Phone: +55 (16) 3514-7100

Opening hours: Monday to Friday: 08:30 to 18:00

Call Center
Exclusive channel for reservations, questions and information about flights

Phone: +55 (16) 4000-1777 (Local call cost)
Alternative phone: +55 (16) 3514-7194

Opening hours: Monday to Friday from 8:00 am to 9:00 pm and Saturdays and Sundays from 10:00 am to 4:00 pm.

SAC – Customer Service
SAC 0800 770 3757
Office hours: Monday to Friday from 8:00 am to 9:00 pm and Saturdays and Sundays from 10:00 am to 4:00 pm.

Customer Service
Email: sac@voepass.com.br
Opening hours: Monday to Friday from 8:00 am to 5:20 pm

Business Center – Service to agencies
Phones: +55 (16) 3514-7170, +55 (16) 3514-7193

Customer service agencies via e-mail

Email: nucleodenegocios@voepass.com.br

Or through the service platform: https://voepass.octadesk.com/login

Opening hours: Monday to Friday: 08:00 to 17:20

Voepass Airlines Official website: https://www.voepass.com.br/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Voepass Airlines

Total fleet: 15

  • Embraer EMB 120ER Brasilia
  • Airbus A310
  • ATR 42–300
  • Embraer ERJ 135
  • Embraer ERJ 145

Voepass Airlines Baggage Allowance

View Voepass Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Special Assistance in Voepass Airlines

Traveling while Pregnant in Voepass Airlines

  • Up to the 27th week of gestation – The pregnant woman must inform about the pregnancy at check in.
  • Between the 28th and 35th week of simple gestation – Declaration of Responsibility
  • The pregnant woman must provide a medical certificate from her obstetrician, valid for up to 30 days.

For more details: https://www.voepass.com.br/empresa/site/atendimentos-especiais

Traveling with Pets in Voepass Airlines

  • Voepass transports only small domestic animals (dog and cat) in the passenger cabin, being limited to 03 animals per flight.

For more details: https://www.voepass.com.br/empresa/site/transporte-animais

Queries handled by Voepass Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Voepass Airlines in Ribeirao Preto, Brazil Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Voepass Airlines in Ribeirao Preto, Brazil: (click on the stars below)
